comment.author: 22968943@N05
comment._content: Looks rather small for a transatlantic vessel from that time.  Beam can't be more than eight or ten feet.  Given the sailing mast, they didn't have complete confidence in the powerplant  I guess.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: See www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2333665436/ for another photo and information about the transatlantic passage.
